subject: Re: [ot] Windows programming
body:
On Sun, Jun 24, 2007 at 11:43:43AM +0800, Kerry Hoath wrote:
> make your synth emulation table driven that way you can emulate a whole 
> stack of synths like doubletalk dectalk porttalk and accent that should 
> cover most things.

Will probably do that for the commands but was particularly
wondering how other synths handled indexing.  The accent
for example sends 0x06 back as a marker whenever the user
drops an index into a stream or can be queried with an
escape code.  As long as the other synths do something like
that it might have a chance at being compatible.
